game.name: Fallout New Vegas: Old World Blues
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: New Terrain, new enemies, an increased level cap, new perks and weapons! Explore the Big Empty, fight bizarre robot scorpions and find new armors.
game.shortDescriptionEn: New Terrain, new enemies, an increased level cap, new perks and weapons! Explore the Big Empty, fight bizarre robot scorpions and find new armors.
